text:
Target understandings:

  • Electricity going in and out of a computer can be measured and controlled
  • Analog signals can be converted to digital signals.‚Äù   
  • We can use and mix/match dedicated components to control signal
  • We can use dedicated functions to read those signals

Drag and drop this tile into your workspace and answer the following question

Do Now:

The lightbulb circuit we created in the last module was either on or off, but have you ever used a lightbulb that had more settings than just on and off? In your workspace, write about how you think dimmer switches for light bulbs might work.
